short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Making web sites work better for us

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1 Hide sidebars so that we have more space to chat.
2 Show all messages in complete, don't collapse or fold anything.
3 Add Today, Yesterday and weekday for time stamps.
4 Highlight new message and scroll to the first unread one.

Please let me know if you have any comments and suggestions. Thanks!
